text: "Love Happens Like That" is a song recorded by American country music artist Neal McCoy. It was released in June 1998 as the third single from the album Be Good at It. The song reached #29 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Aaron Barker, Ron Harbin and Anthony L. Smith. ==Critical reception== A review in Billboard noted that the song had a light and breezy summertime feel that should find a comfortable home a country radio.
